description: Father Sergiy seized control of a women's monastery in the Urals in June and refused to leave.
title: Russia police arrest Covid-denying priest Father Sergiy
title_page: Russia police arrest Covid-denying priest Father Sergiy - BBC News
maintext: Legally, the priest has changed his secular name to Nikolai Romanov, in honour of Russia's last Tsar Nicholas II. The former emperor and his family were thought to have been buried outside Yekaterinburg after their murders in 1918, near the Sredneuralsk site, and Fr Sergiy is seen as the figurehead of the shadowy "tsar worshipper" movement within the church.
